games.title: Overlord's New Mansion
games.description: After the construction of his new majestic castle, filled with deadly traps, the evil Overlord orders a pizza, as usual. But little did he know of all the the hassle he has to go through.

games.title: Mad Pirate Skeleton Bomber
games.description: You're a crazy pirate brought back to life and you urge to blow stuff up.

games.title: Parallel Traveller [Alpha]
games.description: This is a demo/alpha of a game I've working on, it' about a journey through parallel dimensions.
